content:
Hello,
I am looking for documentation on the HSPC Java Client- https://bitbucket.org/hspconsortium/java-client/src/develop/

The link above is broken - @Travis Cummings @Dan Gottlieb

Can anyone share a sample Smart of fhir java starter web app? I'm trying to understand sessions and the request/refresh token flow and how to create a production level smart on fhir oauth 2.0 client.

Any help or guidance is appreciated!

Thanks,

Joel
